p: Similar to other serotypes, DENV-4 samples collected from southern Thailand belonged to multiple genotypes. Nine samples belonged to the genotype I and clustered with strains collected in Central Thailand in 2016–2017, in Singapore in 2014 and in China in 2013, forming a monophyletic lineage ( Fig 5, label a). The six remaining samples grouped in a well-supported lineage ( Fig 5, label b) belonging to the genotype II, within clade II-B along with strains from Southeast Asia and Australia between 2000–2016 ( Fig 5).
